# Course Information {-}

- [alphonse.github.io/chem370](https://alphonse.github.io/chem370)

### Books Referenced Herein {-}

- **"Harvey"**: Harvey, D. *Analytical Chemistry 2.1* Available on [Chemistry LibreTexts](https://chem.libretexts.org/Bookshelves/Analytical_Chemistry/Book%3A_Analytical_Chemistry_2.1_(Harvey))

- **"Granger"**: Granger, R.M, H.M. Yochum, J.N. Granger, and K.D. Sienerth. *Instrumental Analysis* (Revised First Edition). Oxford University Press. ISBN: [9780190865337](https://global.oup.com/ushe/product/instrumental-analysis-9780190865337?cc=us&lang=en&) (Rental Book, available in WCU Bookstore)

### Topics/Readings {-}

**Part I: Foundations**

- Granger Chapter 1 (toolbox)
- Harvey Chapters:
    - 1 (intro)
    - 2, 3 (tools, vocabulary)
    - 4 (data evaluation)
    - 5 (standardization)
- Granger Chapter 5 (signals and noise)
- Granger Chapter 22 (statistical data analysis)

**Part II: Spectroscopy**

- Granger Chapters:
    - 2 (intro)
    - 3 (optics)
    - 6 (UV-vis)
    - 8 (luminesence)
    - 11 (FT-IR)
    - 7, 9 (atomic)

**Part III: Mass Spectrometry**

- Granger Chapter 13

**Part IV: Separations**

- Granger Chapters 15 and 16 (LC & GC)

**Part V: Special Topics**

- TBD (SEM/TEM, CRD, PAS)
